page.title: 16HIGHER TREBYAN FARM
page.content:
This farm is worked by Mr. and Mrs. P. Coad and is owned by the Lanhydrock Estate. It consists of 94 acres - 26 fields of grass used for silage and hay. The farm is a mixed Beef and Diary farm. There are 45 cows and 45 bullocks. Other animals include 12 chickens and2 horses. The farm buliding is 350 years old. The Coads have worked the farm for 29 years.
List of equipment:- 4 tractors, 2 foragers, 2 dung spreaders, 1 hedge trimmer, 1 plough and 1 bailer. On the property is a preserved cromlech.
